1.name: Bend Fate
1.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order. Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

2.name: Bend Fate
2.text: Privately view the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and put them back in any order. Privately view the top 3 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.
